name: FizzBuzz EN
description: Write the classic FizzBuzz function. For a given number: Return 'FizzBuzz' if divisible by both 3 AND 5. Return 'Fizz' if only divisible by 3. Return 'Buzz' if only divisible by 5. Otherwise return the number as a string.
hints: Check divisibility by 15 (3 AND 5) first, then by 3, then by 5. Use the modulo operator %.
